title: Logging into DocuSign
content:
Instructions Log into your Okta Portal if you have not yet done so for the day. Click the tile for DocuSign in Okta . [Image] You will be redirected into DocuSign’s home screen for . [NOTE] If you do not see a tile for DocuSign in your Okta portal, please submit a request to access this application. Requests are self-service and immediately executed via: Okta Access Request Portal The /access DocuSign shortcut in any Slack channel or DM.[PANEL] Don’t like reading instructions? Watch this brief video for the same information…

Page Labels: virtual_agent
